name: Lunala
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.

abilities.name: Shadow Shield
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any {P} Energy attached to it, it takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Full Moon Ray
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
